thread.title: Steele narrowly hangs onto lead at PGA Tour season opener
thread.title_full: Steele narrowly hangs onto lead at PGA Tour season opener

author: DOUG FERGUSON
title: Steele narrowly hangs onto lead at PGA Tour season opener
text:
Eric Risberg Steele narrowly hangs onto lead at PGA Tour season opener 
Brendan Steele hits out of a bunker up to the second green of the Silverado Resort North Course during the third round of the Frys.com golf tournament Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015, in Napa, Calif. (AP Photo/Eric Risberg) Eric Risberg Steele narrowly hangs onto lead at PGA Tour season opener 
Rory McIlroy, of Northern Ireland, reacts after missing a birdie putt on the second green of the Silverado Resort North Course during the third round of the Frys.com golf tournament Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015, in Napa, Calif. (AP Photo/Eric Risberg) Eric Risberg Steele narrowly hangs onto lead at PGA Tour season opener 
Emiliano Grillo, of Argentina, putts on the 18th green of the Silverado Resort North Course during the third round of the Frys.com golf tournament Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015, in Napa, Calif. (AP Photo/Eric Risberg) Eric Risberg Steele narrowly hangs onto lead at PGA Tour season opener 
Kevin Na hits out of a bunker up to the 18th green of the Silverado Resort North Course during the third round of the Frys.com golf tournament Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015, in Napa, Calif. (AP Photo/Eric Risberg) Eric Risberg Steele narrowly hangs onto lead at PGA Tour season opener 
Justin Rose, of Britain, hits out of a bunker up to the second green of the Silverado Resort North Course during the third round of the Frys.com golf tournament Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015, in Napa, Calif. (AP Photo/Eric Risberg) Eric Risberg Steele narrowly hangs onto lead at PGA Tour season opener 
Will Wilcox chips the ball onto the sixth green of the Silverado Resort North Course during the third round of the Frys.com golf tournament Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015, in Napa, Calif. (AP Photo/Eric Risberg) Eric Risberg Steele narrowly hangs onto lead at PGA Tour season opener 
Harold Varner III follows his putt on the second green of the Silverado Resort North Course during the third round of the Frys.com golf tournament Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015, in Napa, Calif. (AP Photo/Eric Risberg) Posted: Saturday, October 17, 2015 9:16 pm 
NAPA, Calif. (AP) — Brendan Steele did just enough to keep the lead Saturday in the Frys.com Open.
